name: desmos-unlocked
description: Browser extension for better user control of the Desmos graphing calculator configuration

scripts.app:chrome: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='chrome' webpack --config webpack/webpack.prod.js
scripts.app:chrome-dev: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='chrome' webpack --config webpack/webpack.dev.js --watch
scripts.app:edge: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='edge' webpack --config webpack/webpack.prod.js
scripts.app:edge-dev: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='edge' webpack --config webpack/webpack.dev.js --watch
scripts.app:opera: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='opera' webpack --config webpack/webpack.prod.js
scripts.app:opera-dev: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='opera' webpack --config webpack/webpack.dev.js --watch
scripts.app:firefox: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='firefox' webpack --config webpack/webpack.prod.js
scripts.app:firefox-dev: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='firefox' webpack --config webpack/webpack.dev.js --watch

author: Matthew Sinclair
